system.description:
You have learned to blend inspiring words, magic, and weaponry into a seamless personal fighting style. You gain the following benefits:

  • If you score a critical hit while concentrating on a battle hymn, you recover a point of exertion.
  • When you use Percussion option from Art Specialty to cast a spell, you can make a single melee attack with a bludgeoning weapon as a bonus attack. On a hit, this attack deals additional thunder damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
  • You gain proficiency with the Cutting Omen combat tradition and learn a maneuver of a level you could learn. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
